last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kang faces disciplinary action, Joo-ha and Soo-ho make their amends, and Geu-rim continues to carve out her own place in radio.

name: Radio Romance
overview: Song Geurim is a radio program writer who isn't exactly talented in writing. She's got the passion, initiative, and drive, but due to her lack of writing skills, she still remains an assistant writer. When she was young, the radio was the only thing in the world that she could share with her blind mother. She was consoled by the sounds of the radio and loved it more than anything, so she became a writer. When her radio program is on the verge of cancellation, she succeeds in casting a top actor Ji Suho, who can't do anything without a script.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: When the star of her radio show runs off, Song Geu-rim loses her job. If she wants another opportunity, she must pull off the seemingly impossible.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: It's up to Geu-rim to figure out how to convince Ji Soo-ho to host the new radio show, but her methods don't seem to work on him.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Soo-ho's decision thrills everyone at the broadcast station. But first, they must agree to his eyebrow-raising requirements for the contract.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Everything goes wrong on an overnight work trip for the show's staff. On launch day, Geu-rim is met with a disappointing surprise.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A battle of wills between Lee Kang and Soo-ho leads to an unfortunate situation. Geu-rim comes home to an unexpected guest.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Geu-rim follows Soo-ho out of town for a shoot. On the way back, a snowstorm prevents them from getting to the station in time for broadcast.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Soo-ho pours his energy into finding ways to spend more time with Geu-rim. Wanting to advance her own agenda for him, Nam Joo-ha stirs up trouble.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: An emergency sends Geu-rim to the hospital, where Kang and Soo-ho join her. While there, she has a revelation about her childhood first love.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: With the help of a young patient, the team pulls together a successful broadcast from the hospital. Jin Tae-ri fills in for Ra Ra-hui's show.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Joo-ha delivers an ultimatum to the broadcast station. Word spreads about Soo-ho signing a deal to star in a new TV drama, which he denies.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: While Soo-ho stands up to his mother, pressure from the top puts the radio show in jeopardy. Kang remains unrelenting.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Kang works on getting the show back on the air. After learning the real reason behind the mess, Soo-ho has a tense confrontation with Joo-ha.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Geu-rim deals with a startling confession, a sudden call from Joo-ha and the eruption of a dating scandal that places her in a tight spot.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Being in a public relationship presents new challenges for Geu-rim and Soo-ho. Jason urges Soo-ho to tell Geu-rim the truth about their past.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Soo-ho reveals one last secret he's been keeping from Geu-rim. A news story threatens to destroy everything Joo-ha has worked for.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Kang faces disciplinary action, Joo-ha and Soo-ho make their amends, and Geu-rim continues to carve out her own place in radio.
